#labels Featured

= ZKGrails 1.0-RC2 Release Notes =

18 Oct 2010. This is the first release candidate of ZKGrails for the 1.0 series. It supports Grails 1.2.x, 1.3.x and ZK 5.0.4. ZKGrails is released under LGPL.

*Note that* as it is still a release candidate, users are still expected to encounter some remaining bugs. Please help us make the better plugin by reporting bugs to the issue tracker.

== Issues ==
  * issue 139 (omadruga)	Comet don't support more than one comet for the same composer
  * issue 159 (chanwit)	Grails 1.3.5 issue when openning multiple zul pages
  * issue 160 (chanwit)	Upgrading ZKGrails to use Grails 1.3.5 breaks 'grails war' because selenium-rc dependency
  * issue 161 (chanwit)	ZKGrails is not compilable using Grails 1.2.x after fixing issue #159			
  * issue 163 (chanwit)	Improve and support page filter to both Grails 1.2.x and 1.3.x

== Enhancements ==
  * None.
